fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player. If they're unique, grant them roleblock immunity. Otherwise, roleblock them. You will be notified about which happens.
- Choose two players. If the first target is unique, you will control them (learning their role and feedback) into your second target. Cannot be used until Night 4.
- Attack a player. Cannot be used until Night 4 and has a one night cooldown between uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Unique roles oppose other unique roles, and must eliminate all other uniques in addition to their normal wincon. They're aware of this.
- This role cannot spawn unless there are two or more unique roles.
- In games where there are 5 or more unique roles, you will be aware of every player with a unique role, but not the roles themselves.
- You will prevent the game from ending if you're alive and have not won yet.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have a unique role win the game with no other winners (not counting yourself) alive. You can win while dead.
